ApplyArtifactsRequest.description: Request body for applying artifacts to a virtual machine.

artifacts.description: The list of artifacts to apply.

ArmTemplateInfo.description: Information about a generated ARM template.

parameters.description: The parameters of the ARM template.

deploymentStatus.description: The deployment status of the artifact.

artifactsApplied.description: The total count of the artifacts that were successfully applied.

totalArtifacts.description: The total count of the artifacts that were tentatively applied.

parameters.description: The parameters of the artifact.

name.description: The name of the artifact parameter.

value.description: The value of the artifact parameter.

filePath.description: The file path of the artifact.

targetOsType.description: Gets or sets the type of the target os.

parameters.description: The parameters of the artifact.

displayName.description: The display name of the artifact source.

uri.description: The URI of the artifact source.

sourceType.description: The type of the artifact source.

folderPath.description: The folder path of the artifact source.

branchRef.description: The branch reference of the artifact source.

securityToken.description: The security token of the artifact source.

status.description: The status of the artifact source.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.
The provisioning status of the resource.

CostPerDayProperties.description: The per-day properties of a cost item.

date.description: The date of the cost item.

cost.description: The cost of the cost item.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the cost.

costs.description: The per-day costs items of the cost.

vhd.description: The VHD from which the image is to be created.

description.description: The description of the custom image.

osType.description: The OS type of the custom image.

author.description: The author of the custom image.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the custom image.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

CustomImagePropertiesCustom.description: Properties for creating a custom image from a VHD.

sysPrep.description: Indicates whether sysprep has been run on the VHD.

CustomImagePropertiesFromVm.description: Properties for creating a custom image from a virtual machine.

sysPrep.description: Indicates whether sysprep has been run on the VHD.

windowsOsInfo.description: The Windows OS information of the VM.

linuxOsInfo.description: The Linux OS information of the VM.

EvaluatePoliciesProperties.description: Properties for evaluating a policy set.

EvaluatePoliciesRequest.description: Request body for evaluating a policy set.

EvaluatePoliciesResponse.description: Response body for evaluating a policy set.

results.description: Results of evaluating a policy set.

osType.description: The OS type of the formula.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the formula.

vm.description: Information about a VM from which a formula is to be created.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

FormulaPropertiesFromVm.description: Information about a VM from which a formula is to be created.

labVmId.description: The identifier of the VM from which a formula is to be created.

author.description: The author of the gallery image.

createdDate.description: The creation date of the gallery image.

description.description: The description of the gallery image.

imageReference.description: The image reference of the gallery image.

icon.description: The icon of the gallery image.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this gallery image is enabled.

GalleryImageReference.description: The reference information for an Azure Marketplace image.

offer.description: The offer of the gallery image.

publisher.description: The publisher of the gallery image.

sku.description: The SKU of the gallery image.

osType.description: The OS type of the gallery image.

version.description: The version of the gallery image.

GenerateArmTemplateRequest.description: Parameters for generating an ARM template for deploying artifacts.

virtualMachineName.description: The resource name of the virtual machine.

parameters.description: The parameters of the ARM template.

location.description: The location of the virtual machine.

GenerateUploadUriParameter.description: Properties for generating an upload URI.

blobName.description: The blob name of the upload URI.

GenerateUploadUriResponse.description: Response body for generating an upload URI.

uploadUri.description: The upload URI for the VHD.

minute.description: Minutes of the hour the schedule will run.

artifactsStorageAccount.description: The artifact storage account of the lab.

storageAccounts.description: The storage accounts of the lab.

vaultName.description: The name of the key vault of the lab.

labStorageType.description: The type of the lab storage.

defaultVirtualNetworkId.description: The default virtual network identifier of the lab.

createdDate.description: The creation date of the lab.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

LabVhd.description: Properties of a VHD in the lab.

id.description: The absolute URI of the VHD.

notes.description: The notes of the virtual machine.

ownerObjectId.description: The object identifier of the owner of the virtual machine.

createdByUserId.description: The object identifier of the creator of the virtual machine.

createdByUser.description: The email address of creator of the virtual machine.

computeId.description: The resource identifier (Microsoft.Compute) of the virtual machine.

customImageId.description: The custom image identifier of the virtual machine.

osType.description: The OS type of the virtual machine.

size.description: The size of the virtual machine.

userName.description: The user name of the virtual machine.

password.description: The password of the virtual machine administrator.

sshKey.description: The SSH key of the virtual machine administrator.

isAuthenticationWithSshKey.description: A value indicating whether this virtual machine uses an SSH key for authentication.

fqdn.description: The fully-qualified domain name of the virtual machine.

labSubnetName.description: The lab subnet name of the virtual machine.

labVirtualNetworkId.description: The lab virtual network identifier of the virtual machine.

disallowPublicIpAddress.description: Indicates whether the virtual machine is to be created without a public IP address.

artifacts.description: The artifacts to be installed on the virtual machine.

artifactDeploymentStatus.description: The artifact deployment status for the virtual machine.

galleryImageReference.description: The Microsoft Azure Marketplace image reference of the virtual machine.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

linuxOsState.description: The state of the Linux OS.

factName.description: The fact name of the policy.

factData.description: The fact data of the policy.

evaluatorType.description: The evaluator type of the policy.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

PolicySetResult.description: Result of a policy set evaluation.

hasError.description: A value indicating whether this policy set evaluation has discovered violations.

code.description: The code of the policy violation.

message.description: The message of the policy violation.
